headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Type of asset that you want to get. Enum values: ADVERTISER : ad account (advertiser account). CATALOG : catalog. TIKTOK_SHOP : TikTok Shop. PIXEL : Pixel. LEAD : Leads. TT_ACCOUNT : TikTok account. This asset type corresponds to the identity type BC_AUTH_TT . Learn more from Identities .

parameters.name: filtering
parameters.description: Filtering conditions. Note : You cannot use user_id and user_email at the same time. If you don't specify any filter values, the system will pass in to the user_id field the user ID of the TikTok for Business account that gives you the authorization code ( auth_code ).

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user that you want to get assets for. Note : user_id and user_mail cannot be set at the same time. For users that are in BOUND status, use user_id to get their assets. For users that are in PENDING status, use user_email to get their assets.

parameters.name: user_email
parameters.description: Email of the user that you want to get assets for. Note : user_id and user_mail cannot be set at the same time. For users that are in BOUND status, use user_id to get their assets. For users that are in PENDING status, use user_email to get their assets. Use user_email as filter only when you've set asset_type as ADVERTISER and the invitation for the user to join Business Center is still pending.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword of the asset you are looking for.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: asset_type
fields.description: Asset type. Enum values: ADVERTISER : ad account (advertiser account). CATALOG : catalog. TIKTOK_SHOP : TikTok Shop. PIXEL : Pixel. LEAD : Leads. TT_ACCOUNT : TikTok account. This asset type corresponds to the identity type BC_AUTH_TT . Learn more from Identities .

fields.name: asset_id
fields.description: Asset ID. If asset_type is ADVERTISER , this field is the advertiser ID. If asset_type is CATALOG , this field is the catalog ID. If asset_type is TIKTOK_SHOP , this field is the TikTok Shop ID. If asset_type is PIXEL , this field is the Pixel ID. If asset_type is LEAD , this field is the form library ID. To obtain more details about form libraries that you have access to, use /page/library/get/ . If asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT , this field is the ID of a TikTok account in a Business Center.

fields.name: advertiser_account_type
fields.description: Type of the ad account. Enum values: RESERVATION (reservation ad account), AUCTION (auction ad account).

fields.name: advertiser_role
fields.description: Business Center user's permissions to the ad account. Enum values: ADMIN : Admin. Manage ad account finances, settings, and permissions. Create and edit ad campaigns and view performance data. OPERATOR : Operator. Manage finances for ad accounts, create and edit ad campaigns, and view performance data. ANALYST : Analyst. View ads and performance data. This field returns a non-null value when asset_type is ADVERTISER .

fields.name: catalog_role
fields.description: Business Center user's permissions to the catalog. Enum values: ADMIN : Catalog management. Promote products both organically and in ads, and edit products and catalogs. AD_PROMOTE : Ad promotion. Create ads using product catalogs. This field returns a non-null value when asset_type is CATALOG .

fields.name: ad_creation_eligible
fields.description: Returned only when asset_type is CATALOG . Whether the catalog can be used in ads when it contains the number of available products required for the ad format. Enum values: NOT_AVAILABLE : The catalog cannot be used in ads. AVAILABLE : The catalog can be used in ads when it contains the number of available products required for the ad format.

fields.name: store_role
fields.description: Business Center user's permission to the TikTok Shop. Enum values: AD_PROMOTION : Ad promotion. Create ads promoting products from this TikTok Shop. This field returns a non-null value when asset_type is TIKTOK_SHOP .

fields.name: tt_account_roles
fields.description: Business Center user's permission to the TikTok account. Enum values: POST : Existing posts permissions, including accessing your own profile info, accessing your own public videos, and accessing your own ad-authorized videos. LIVE : LIVE video permissions (Only available in some regions), including accessing your own profile info and accessing LIVE videos. DIRECT_MESSAGE : Direct message permissions, including allowing everyone to send you a direct message and reading and managing direct messages in your inbox, in addition to messaging or interacting with other accounts on your behalf. This field returns a non-null value when asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT .

fields.name: owner_bc_name
fields.description: The owner Business Center of this asset. When asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "page_info": {
            "total_number": 2,
            "page": 1,
            "page_size": 10,
            "total_page": 1
        },
        "list": [
            {
                "asset_name": "{{asset_name}}",
                "store_role": null,
                "catalog_role": null,
                "advertiser_role": "ADMIN",
                "tt_account_roles": null,
                "owner_bc_name": "{{owner_bc_name}}",
                "advertiser_account_type": "AUCTION",
                "asset_id": "{{asset_id}}",
                "asset_type": "ADVERTISER"
            },
            {
                "asset_name": "{{asset_name}}",
                "store_role": null,
                "catalog_role": null,
                "advertiser_role": "ADMIN",
                "tt_account_roles": null,
                "owner_bc_name": "{{owner_bc_name}}",
                "advertiser_account_type": "AUCTION",
                "asset_id": "{{asset_id}}",
                "asset_type": "ADVERTISER"
            }
        ]
    }
}
